title:
Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool Kitchen;
stainless stell and PP material; colors: blue, gray, pink; size: 17x4.5 cm;
descriptions:
Introducing our brand new and top-of-the-line Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool Kitchen! Crafted with the utmost care and made from durable stainless steel and PP material, this ice remover is built to withstand the test of time. 

Tired of dealing with messy and frosty fridges? Our Fridge Ice Scraper is here to save the day! Designed to effortlessly clean ice and frost from your refrigerator, it ensures a tidy and clean interior. No more wasting time and energy on tedious cleaning tasks.

This practical mini ice shovel is an absolute must-have for every household. Its compact size makes it easy to store and convenient to use whenever necessary. Whether you're a homeowner or a renter, this ice scraper is perfect for all your deicing needs.

Available in three stunning colors - Blue, Grey, and Pink - our Fridge Ice Scraper adds a touch of style to your kitchen. Choose the color that best suits your taste and effortlessly remove ice with ease.

Measuring approximately 17 x 4.5 cm, this ice scraper is designed to provide optimal comfort and control. Its ergonomic design ensures a comfortable grip, enabling you to tackle even the toughest ice with ease.

Please note that there may be a slight measuring deviation of 1-5mm due to manual measurement. Additionally, the actual color of the item may vary slightly from the pictures due to different monitors and lighting effects.

Say goodbye to the hassle of removing ice from your fridge with our efficient and practical Fridge Ice Scraper. Order yours today and make cleaning your refrigerator a breeze!
